item.title: Enviri Stock Takes Off After Clean Earth Sale And Spinoff Plan Revealed
item.description: Enviri sells Clean Earth to Veolia for $3.04B cash, plans spin-off of Harsco units and major debt reduction as shares jump premarket. read more
